meta.content: Technology; Corrections; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

abstract.p: Correction of April 16 article about new health information Web site RevolutionHealth.com; Stephen M Case has invested $100 million in Revolution Health Group, other board members about $30 million

block.p: An article in Business Day on Monday about a new health information Web site, RevolutionHealth.com, misstated the contribution of various investors in Revolution Health Group, which operates the site. The business's founder and chairman, Stephen M. Case, has put $100 million of his own money into Revolution Health Group, and his other board members have invested about $30 million. Mr. Case and the investors have not contributed $500 million to Revolution Health Group. (Mr. Case has put about $500 million of his own money into the various business ventures, including the health group, that operate under his holding company Revolution L.L.C.)

An article in Business Day on Monday about a new health information Web site, RevolutionHealth.com, misstated the contribution of various investors in Revolution Health Group, which operates the site. The business's founder and chairman, Stephen M. Case, has put $100 million of his own money into Revolution Health Group, and his other board members have invested about $30 million. Mr. Case and the investors have not contributed $500 million to Revolution Health Group. (Mr. Case has put about $500 million of his own money into the various business ventures, including the health group, that operate under his holding company Revolution L.L.C.)
